item.text: <h3>Visualization
We're interested in new kinds of visualization and new ways to make them.
[http://chartsnthings.tumblr.com/ Charts 'n Things] is a blog of data sketches from the New York Times Graphics Department by [http://kevinquealy.com/ Kevin Quealy].
[http://exposedata.com/parallel/ Parallel Coordinates] view into many objects with many attributes. Working example with a tutorial.
[http://www.jasondavies.com/parallel-sets/ Parallel Sets] view into many objects with many attributes that might not be quantitative.
[http://apps1.eere.energy.gov/buildings/publications/pdfs/ssl/2012_led_lca-pt2.pdf PNNL's CFL v. LED] report uses radar charts to visualize LCA data with improvements over what we do.
[http://square.github.com/crossfilter/ Cross Filter] client-side slicing of large datasets with rendering in D3.
[http://datadesk.latimes.com/ L.A. Times] data desk, a python shop.

[http://www.evolutionoftheweb.com/ Evolution of the Web] interactive infographic. [http://hyperakt.com/work-detail/314 hyperakt], [http://vizzuality.com/projects/evolutionofweb20 vizzuality] backstory.
[http://www.bbc.co.uk/blogs/bbcinternet/2012/08/building_olympic_website.html BBC's Web] for covering the olympics.
[http://portlandpulse.org/workshops Greater Portland Pulse] offers urban datasets and the means to explore their visualization.
[http://www.cuttherope.ie/ Cut The Rope] translated from objective-c to html5 to demo the game performance of IE9/10.
[http://eng.archinform.net/ Architectural Database] suggests top level place patterns db. Makes good use of Bird's Eye View.

[http://www.directionsmag.com/articles/whats-new-with-javascript-and-geospatial-wrapup-from-the-js.geo-event/304082 js.geo] event writeup with lots of pointers. [http://mapbrief.com/2012/11/21/js-geo-2013-a-meeting-of-javascript-mappers-in-denver/ website]
[http://moebio.com/ Santiago Ortiz] visualizes collections, especially collections of visualizations.
[http://www.jasondavies.com/ Jason Davies] creative with and upon d3.js, especially [http://www.jasondavies.com/maps/ maps]
[http://chimera.labs.oreilly.com/books/1230000000345/ Interactive Data Visualization] free online book by Scott Murray for d3.js from O'Reilly.
[http://www.printwhatyoulike.com Print What You Like] web tool selects and edits pages for printing. [http://www.printwhatyoulike.com/print?url=http://code.fed.wiki.org/hyperperl.html sample]
[http://cutjs.org/ CutJS] add-on DOM for canvas animations.
See more [[Related Sites]]
[http://mbtaviz.github.io/ Visualizing MBTA Trains] in the style of Tufte & Victor.
<h3>Visualization
[http://charlie-roberts.com/gibber/ Gibber] audio/video synthesis by Charlie Roberts, UCSD.
